entities.name: lal-ye/goose
observations: This is the main repository for the Goose project.
Contains tool aliases in the `goose-memory/tool_aliases.txt` file.

entities.name: Goose Tool Aliases (Memory)
observations: A list of tool aliases currently loaded in Goose's memory.
Maintained for quick access and command execution.

entities.name: sessions (GitHub)
observations: This directory in the lal-ye/goose repository stores session summaries.
Contains Markdown files with records of Goose sessions.
